history.content:
Do you want to make an impact on the Berkeley tech community? Do you want to lead projects related to diversity and representation, mental health resources, more?

 

The ASUC Office of Senator Maddy Chen is looking for Tech, Social Good, and Data Science associates.  You do not have to have any prior ASUC experience, just a passion for driving results and making an impact on our community. 

This semester, our office is also launching an exciting new tech for social good project with non-profit ARGO. We are looking for developers and data scientists, so If you're interested in applying your tech skills to create something meaningful, apply below.
APPLICATIONS ARE DUE THIS THURSDAY, JANUARY 28, 2020 AT 11:59PM PST. WE WILL CONTACT YOU FOR INTERVIEWS AND NEXT STEPS.
We look forward to reading your application!
Questions? Email: mchen@asuc.org
For full descriptions: tinyurl.com/mchenoffice
Office Associate Application Link: tinyurl.com/mchensp21app (NO technical experience needed)
CivicTech Developer Application Link: https://forms.gle/m2EWaicGVkMy4WsM6 (technical experience recommended)
history.subject: Apply to be a Tech, Social Good, Data Science Associate for ASUC
